2.title: The Frozen Prison

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: An alleged rapist forces his 17-year-old victim to marrying him, then imprisons her in a psychological cage for seven years.

3.title: Family Predator

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: A serial child molester preys on young women in his own family for two generations, then vanishes just before his 12-year-old daughter is about testify at his trial.

4.title: Good Wife

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Only months after their arranged marriage, a young husband from India allegedly beats his wife to death while the two work an overnight shift in the kitchen of a Maryland donut shop.

5.title: Sacrament of Blood

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: A Santeria priest allegedly murders his lover, rapes a minor during a "healing" ritual, and molests his step-daughter - all hiding behind the cloak of his religion.

6.title: Stolen Innocence

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: A family man rapes his 12-year-old stepdaughter for five years before she comes forward with the truth -- then he goes on the run.

7.title: A Final Romance

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: An unlikely love affair develops between former high school classmates who reconnected on Facebook - but the whirlwind romance ends with one lover dead and the other on the run.

8.title: School of Lies

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: A convicted sex offender and his girlfriend, Ty and Tisa Yiyara, pose as upright citizens founding a progressive urban school -- until they are caught having sex with one of the students, Kim.

9.title: The Stolen Child

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: A father in the midst of a custody battle over his son discovers a note announcing that the child's mother has vanished, taking their child with her; a young mother working as a custodian in an office complex is found raped and strangled.

10.title: Death Do Us Part

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: A Southern California millionaire allegedly murders his wife, and then calls the authorities with a far-fetched claim that a house-painter did it.

11.title: Brutal Obsession

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: A rejected, abusive boyfriend stalks his ex, the mother of his child, trapping and killing her in her workplace; a 61-year-old grandmother is raped by a 37-year-old after he lures her to his dungeon-like home.

12.title: Enemy Territory

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Accused of killing a veteran while driving under the influence, a DUI offender flees before his trial is set to begin.

13.title: Bad Cop

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: A former police officer who had stalked, assaulted, or attempted to seduce more than five young women over the course of his career, is arrested while attempting to hook up with minor girls using Internet chat rooms.

14.title: No Way Out

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: In a nightmarish story, a young girl being raped by her stepfather tells her family and the authorities - and no one believes her.

15.title: Death in Broad Daylight

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: During a protest in the early 1980s, Donna Joan Borup, a member of a radical group, blinds a police officer and goes on the run for 35 years.

16.title: Factory of Death

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Murder in the Mountains

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Northern California, 2013: Shane Franklin Miller is on the lam in the mountains after allegedly murdering his wife and their two children. Authorities believe he's hiding in a survivalist bunker, possibly on his own property.

2.title: The Enemy Next Door

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: In the years before Facebook and continuing into Facebook relevance, Kevin Stoeser is investigated for multiple cases of pedophilia; Charles Mozdir, a suspected "nice guy" pedophile, is also profiled.

3.title: Family Annihilator

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: North Carolina, 1976: After brutally slaying five family members and torching their bodies, former diplomat William Bradford Bishop Jr. flees overseas and eludes authorities for decades.

4.title: Under the Influence

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Florida, 2013: Convicted drunk driver Christopher Ponce removes his tracking device and vanishes. Montana, 2012: David Burgert, a troubled ex-Marine turned survivalist, fires on police and vanishes into the woods without a trace.

5.title: Point Blank Murder

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Colorado, 1986: New evidence in the case of Thayne Smika leads to a manhunt for the suspect. California, 2004: Frederick Mclean disappears after facing multiple charges of child molestation.

6.title: Trafficking in Death

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Iowa, 2003: Guillermo Madrigal Ballesteros is suspected of letting 11 undocumented immigrants perish in an overheated rail car. The accused human trafficker then goes on the run from authorities.

7.title: Preaching Lies

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Minnesota, 2014: Victor Barnard, leader of the River Road Fellowship, is charged with criminal and sexual misconduct relating to having sex with married women and underage girls.

8.title: Justice Denied

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Minnesota, 1989: Parents of Jacob Erwin Wetterling keep the search for their son alive after more than 25 years. New Hampshire, 2004: Genevieve Kelley abducts her own daughter and hides her for more than a decade.

1.title: Still Running

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Updates on Season 1 cases and recaps of still-open cases from Season 1.

2.title: Crimes of the Father

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Texas, 2008: Yaser Abdel Said is wanted for the double homicide of his daughters.

3.title: Deadly Lust

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Family members in California details the manipulation and sexual molestation of a man who they trusted as a father, which leads to the 2008 murder of a step-daughter who he molested and had a child with; a Charleston, South Carolina Police officer becomes a fugitive from justice after he killed his Brazilian-born wife and charged with sexually molesting a student from his karate class in 2005.

4.title: Torture House

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Oregon, 1991: After years of raping and torturing prostitutes, Paul Jackson and Vance Roberts jump bail. Vance Roberts eventually turns himself in after 15 years. But Paul Jackson is still on the run.

5.title: Fugitive Mom

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Megan Elizabeth Everett takes her three-year-old daughter and disappears; John B. Napier, a serial child molester, is apprehended in Texas but evades his trial and starts his horrific pattern again.

6.title: Innocence Defiled

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Texas, 2011: Multiple young girls accuse Prakashanand Saraswati, local leader of the cult Barsana Dham, of molestation. His disciples come up with $1 million dollars for his bail. Saraswati flees back to his home country of India.

7.title: Decieved to Death

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Texas, 2009: Margaret Lorrain Smith is charged with the murder of her husband for a property windfall and flees; Oregon, 2010: Paul Winklebleck is charged with kidnapping and attempted rape of a minor while on parole.

8.title: Fighting for Life

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Texas, 2002: Herbert Maldonado is charged with the murder of Lori Mejia and narrowly escapes from law enforcement; Missouri, 2002: Bruce Sawhill is charged with child sodomy and runs from the law.

9.title: The Disappearing

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: After a woman's suicide in a Rockford, Illinois in 2011, the family wants know who has her son, whom she took off with and disappeared, leaving a note that states that he has found a family to take care of him; Jealousy and vengeance leads a Virginia man with a lengthy criminal record to commit arson and murder, killing his ex-girlfriend's sister and her son, her mother, and her grandmother.

10.title: The Enemy Within

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: After allegedly murdering his parents in a drug-filled haze of rage and anger, a young father then abandons his child and flees south.

2.title: Confessions of a Killer

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Authorities in Texas are searching for a man who confessed to having murdered a divorced stripper in 2006, but has managed to stay one step ahead of the law. The subject was also profiled on America's Most Wanted twice.

4.title: The Cold-Blooded Charmer

episode of.title: The Hunt with John Walsh (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: A stock broker is the prime suspect in the murder of a Maryland accounting professor after he uses her in a scheme to take advantage of her life savings and their relationship. However, despite DNA evidence linking him to the crime, he has managed to avoid justice by hiding in his native Mexico in order to avoid extradition and claiming innocence.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.title: The Hunt with John Walsh
akas: The Hunt with John Walsh (United States)
plot: They are among the thousands of fugitives who avoid criminal prosecution in the United States every year. Find out more about these fugitives and join John Walsh in his quest to track them down and bring them to justice on "The Hunt."
